ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: Oyster Data
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: Archive containing data for P. maxima analysis with NetView P, including wild (n = 83, SNPs = 999), captive (n = 684, SNPs = 834) and simulated (n = 3000, SNPs = 1271) genotypes, as well as input files (PED/MAP), node attributes and networks for visualization in Cytoscape.
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:subject: Bioinfomatics/Phyloinfomatics
Population Genetics - Empirical
Genomics/Proteomics
Ecological Genetics
Wildlife Management
Captive Populations
